name: Brainstorming Design system
description:
Brainstorming - Design System & Component Library. It helps designers save hundreds of hours of time and build amazing things in Figma.⁣

⁣

𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝘀𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺 𝗶𝗻𝗰𝗹𝘂𝗱𝗲𝘀:⁣

  • 246 different styles⁣
  • 291 components⁣
  • 504 Variants
  • 6 different grids⁣
  • 6 bonus mockup devices⁣

⁣

Save time with pre-made & customisable buttons, drop-downs, calendars, and more.⁣

⁣

Each component or style is fully customisable, exceptionally easy to use and carefully layered and grouped in FIGMA. It's all you need for a quick prototype, design.⁣


Updates - 22.11.2020

- All components transformed to Variants

- All components updated to AutoLayout 3

- New components added


Updates - 16.08.2020

- Layout presentation changed

- New improved color naming

- Component and instances improvement


Updates - 17.05.2020

- Component naming (for better search)

- Constraints updated on form elements
